skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Front-end development is the development of visual and interactive elements of a website that users interact with directly

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Frontend and Backend are the two most popular terms used in web development. The front end is what users see and interact with and the backend is how everything works

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: UI/UX design is a non-technical role in tech that involves the user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) of a product or service

skills.title: Mern Stack Development
skills.description: MERN stack is a JavaScript framework that allows developers to build front end, back end, and server infrastructure for web applications using only JavaScript

portfolio.title: Hand Free Computer
portfolio.description: Developed a cutting-edge, computer vision-based virtual mouse system, enabling hands-free computer interaction for individuals with limited or no hand mobility, resulting in enhanced accessibility and independence.

portfolio.title: Helpico.in
portfolio.description: Welcome to Assignment.com , a dedicated platform committed to empowering students on their academic journey. We understand the unique challenges students face, and our mission is to provide comprehensive support to enhance your learning experience and success.

portfolio.title: Multibrand E-Commerce
portfolio.description: An e-commerce website is a digital storefront that allows people to buy and sell products and services online. It functions as a virtual space where buyers can browse products and make selections, while sellers can showcase products, process orders, and accept payments

testimonial.description: Your leadership on this project has been exceptional.
Your code reviews are always thorough and helpful and done quickly.
Your ability to work well with the other developers is impressive.
Your work consistently meets or exceeds our quality standards.
You have a talent for simplifying complex problems.
